attributes.action: Apologise to us the British People for the way we have been treated in regards political correctness and free speech.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want back our rights for the freedom of free speech and to show our dissaproval of political correctness and the way we are treated as a consequence.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
